snippet.title: Panzer Marshal Game Trailer
snippet.description: Historical tactical scale World War 2 turn based strategy game, that puts the player in the role of an Axis or Allied army officer. You command battalion level units with the objective to fight with the enemies and to defeat crucial landscapes such as the cities, battlefields and other key strategic points.  Forge a battle winning army and conquer your foes. Do you have what it takes to be a Panzer Marshal ?
